LanguageData.SculptureGrand.label: grand sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureGrand.description: A huge sculpture sized to dominate a room.
LanguageData.SculptureLarge.label: large sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureLarge.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.SculptureSmall.label: small sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureSmall.description: A torso-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.Snowman.label: snowman
LanguageData.Snowman.description: A set of large snowballs piled and shaped to resemble a person. People make these for the fun of it.
